review:
We consulted Dr. Nivedita throughout the pregnancy period and had been under her advice till the successful delivery of our baby boy in mid-April 2021. She is beyond exceptional in several ways and would highly recommend her to everyone. 

Her knowledge, experience and overall excellency at work, was quite apparent from our very first visit to the clinic, and we developed complete trust in her from then on - I remember telling my husband on our way back from our first visit, that with her, I feel fully assured that everything will be taken care of and I can completely rely on her. 

On our monthly visits to her through the pregnancy, she always gave us ample time to explain everything in detail and answer all our questions. It was simply amazing how without us having to say much, she was perceptive of our preferences and needs and always seamlessly factored those in her advice to us. Also, it was extremely heartening and almost unbelievable to see that, despite running on such tight schedule and meeting several patients in a day, she remembered the tiniest details about us from our earlier visits, including even the most mundane things like my plans of visiting parents or where they stay - these small things made it apparent how much she cared personally, something that‚Äôs so very precious and rare to find in these times. 

Dr. Nivedita‚Äôs approach of advising on holistic wellness, including all-natural methods such as stressing on walking, exercises, improving dietary intake and closely monitoring weight gain really helped us in eventually being able to have a normal delivery. On the date of delivery, we reached out to her quite early in the morning and she immediately guided us on next steps and personally ensured the coordination with hospital for an extremely smooth admission, despite the additional formalities required due to covid. Dr. Nivedita arrived well in time and stayed with us throughout the long labour. She kept encouraging and guiding me with expertise all along. It was only her presence and calming voice, that helped me bear the killing labour pains - it simply wouldn‚Äôt have been possible without her!

Apart from her medical excellency, the genuineness of her personality and the personal love and care with which she guided us, is something that I haven‚Äôt experienced with any other doctor before. And so, especially in this most important event of our lives, my husband and I feel extremely blessed to have come to know of her and to have been under her guidance. 

If you are looking for a highly experienced gynaecologist who will care and be concerned for you just as family ‚Äì she is the one to go to!

May God always bless her and her family.

review:
Dr. Nivedita has been a greatest support entire my pregnancy. What a lovely lady and a talented doctor. Heard about her from one of my relative, and I contacted her as soon as I got to know about my pregnancy. 
Since my first visit she encouraged for normal delivery. Honestly I never thought about having a normal delivery as I considered it an impossible task. But she made it sound possible.
My entire pregnancy journey turned out utterly beautiful and extremely smooth under her guidance. However, at the starting of my 36th week I started to have some issues and it looked like I might have to deliver prematurely. Still Dr Nivedita didnt give up and after the checkups, ultrasound, tests she assured my that we can wait. Almost every day she texted me about my health and baby movement. Personally I dont think any doctor would do that, but she is more than just a doctor I believe.
Till my last phase she urged for exercise and walking, and I did that. In my 40th week when I experience my water breaking early at 4 am, i immediately called her and as usual she was too quick to respond. She asked me to reach the hospital and she made all the arrangements for me over the call at the hospital. 
At 6.30 she induced, contractions started and the pain was unbearable. I req her to give me a pain killer but she motivated me to bear the pain as having a pain killer could increase the labour duration. 
I was in labour for 4 hours and exactly at 10.20 in the morning I delivered a healthy boy. 
I still cant believe that a person like me had a normal delivery, that too i delivered in just 4 hours, which is next to impossible. 
This is what dr. nivedita is, making imposible possible.
Her support has been a blessing truly. It has been 21 days since I delivered and I feel blissful as I did not have stitches on my tummy. I am just so thankful to her. Had it been any other doctor, I would have faced a c section for sure. 
During my labour she constantly motivated me to breathe deep and be calm. 
Dr nivedita's patience for normal delivery, experience and her talent is what blows our mind. Her polite nature and soft spoken personality is an add on. Whenever I had a query I would drop a msg to her and she quickly used to reply my messages. 
What a wonderful doctor she is. We are lucky we found her and a big thanks to our relative who suggested her.

This was a surreal experience for me 8 years of marriage, 2 failed pregnancies and here I was living my dream of being a mother. All this could just happen because of Dr. Nivedita Raizada. 

They say Dr's are given the place of GOD, I truly truly truly believe in this now. If you have a dream of holding your child in your hands and you are looking for personalised care and attention, Dr. Nivedita is your go to person.
